review: With our relatively old TV (but still new enough to have HDMI ports) we now have access to the various internet based video services.  With Amazon Prime we no longer need Hulu Plus, but this gives us access to both, plus Netflix and many more.  Simple install, and it starts working right away.  Download the free iPhone app and you have a voice control remote.
author: Charlie in Austin

review: Very poorly engineered.  The door for the batteries for the remote control doesn't open without nearly breaking the plastic.  The programs are pay on demand for shows your cable company provides for free.  A total waste of money.

review: Loving it. Didn't get a 5 because when I start it up, I sometimes have to  disconnect it and reconnect it so it will be recognised. But otherwise, it's really worth the money, especially if you have Prime. Just wish I could see the full selection of free Prime movies more easily. But works great.
